full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,SGROL DKAR DANG TSE DPAG MED GNYIS KYI TSE SGRUB NGAG 'DON 'KHYER BDE BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @010A *, ,(ZHES PA 'DI NI CHOS SDE CHEN PO SKU 'BUM BYAMS PA GLING GI TSOGS CHEN DGE BSKOS DKA' BCU SHES RAB CHOS 'BYOR DANG DBU MDZAD RAB 'BYAMS TSUL KHRIMS BZANG PO GNYIS KYIS SBYIN BDAG SOGS KYI RIM 'GROD DU TSE SGRUB DGOS SKABS TSOGS PA'I ZHAL DU 'DON @010B DU 'KHYER BDE 'DI 'DRA DGOS ZHES BSKUL NGOR, DHARMA BADZRA GYIS GA-YAR KHRAL TZAM DU BRIS PA'I YI GE PA NI NGAG DBANG PHUN TSOGS SO, ,)
